content: 🚀 Welcome! This academic homepage was launched on January 27, 2026!
One paper titled 'Autoencoding-Free Context Compression for LLMs via Contextual Semantic Anchors' was accepted to ICLR 2026!
One paper titled 'Position IDs Matter: An Enhanced Position Layout for Efficient Context Compression in Large Language Models' was accepted to EMNLP 2025!
One paper titled 'Time-based Knowledge-aware framework for Multi-Behavior Recommendation' was accepted to ESWA 2025!
Meteor Navigation Station is now officially launched: Start your large model learning journey here!
